storyInfo: The immolation of the townspeople sears Tatjana's nerves. Folinic, who had seemed lost after the death of the suspect, is forced to step onto the battlefield. Rhodes Island faces Reunion's Sarkaz, the Mudrock Squad.

attributes.content: Tatjana! They broke the last Gramophone! There’s nothing we can do against those giants!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: Hey! The rioters started burning houses! Bastards... and the fire’s spreading!
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Where are Tatjana and Severin?! At a time like this!
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Schultz Severin is... wounded. He’s resting.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: He’s resting while we’re out here risking our lives—
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: Quiet! We can’t be fighting each other right now. Look around you, moron!
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Who’s a moron?! I don’t see you doing anything with your Arts!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: S-stop! We need defensive Arts in place to regain control of each jurisdiction.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Caster on the east side down! We need another one up there!
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Careful!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Fire! Incoming!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: Help meeaaaaaaaaahhh!
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: P-put it out! Does anyone have some way of dousing the flames?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk A

attributes.content: It burns! Help meee!
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Tatjana... Save... me....
attributes.name: Townsfolk B

attributes.content: Ahhh... Gaaaaahhhh!!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Any actual words are swallowed up by bloodcurdling screams.
The smell of charred flesh is among the most chilling odors one can experience.
The man, engulfed in flames, slowly loses his form, leaving behind only a darkened, shadow-like corpse.
He struggles to cry out as his skin sears and his blood boils.
He reaches towards me in unspeakable agony, begging me to save him.
But...
But... Did Thor go through that same pain?
Tatjana! Focus! You’re too far out! Careful!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Lucky me! Another noble lapdog to burn alive!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Chaos. The town is all sliced up into nice little pieces, like a cake.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Now, the last piece is crumbling to bits. They can’t stop us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: And even if we stopped ourselves. Even if we packed up and left. Do they really think they could survive?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Leithania will leave them to die.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The nearest nomadic city has 24 of those towers, and not a single lord can spare a glance for the dying little town in the Winterwisp Mountains.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Tragic.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: There was a time when we grew weary of such tragedy. Let’s not forget, standing here.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Think things through.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Sure. Say, why don’t you ever talk like this? I’m just complaining.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Complaining that we held out so long, biding our time, and nothing changed, in the end. It all went to hell.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: It’s just so anti-climactic. I’m disappointed.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: They’re pushing in!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Huh!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I- I’m coming!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Shit! Tough nut to crack!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Where did that Vulpo come from? Are those nine tails I’m seeing?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: No way! She’s Infected! Why is she with them?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: So young... After all you’ve suffered, shouldn’t you be fighting back?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Comrade! Don’t be deceived! Fight the power!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: They are the criminals who chain and oppress us!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: You... don’t know anything!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: She, she sent them flying?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: The Arts around her slowed down? Where do those Arts come from? I’ve never seen it in the books.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: You can’t decide someone else’s fate. Rhodes Island, Mom and Dad, everyone’s always been so good to me!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: And you! Don’t sneak up on me!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Agh...! I can’t... move...!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Hnng!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Stop...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Stop ruining things for everyone! Think about all the pain you’re causing everyone else!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...So, what’s next?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Biederman... the culprit is dead.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We have no hard evidence until Click and Ayerscarpe return...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Then who is the real killer? What is actually happening here?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Now is not the time to discuss that. We have to put down the riot first.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Folinic?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I... I don’t know what to do...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: It’s ridiculous, ironic, and hopeless. A doctor dedicated to healing the Infected died in the midst of an Infected riot.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I’ve been fuming about it... more than anyone.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Hnng!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Why? Why does it have to be this way? Why doesn’t anyone know what’s happening here?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Killing each other doesn’t solve anything! You’re all going to die!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Get out of my way! I will go through you if I have to, kid or not!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: I’m not moving!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You have to listen to me!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Listen to what? Are you playing judge here? Who are you to determine what’s right and what’s wrong?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: How do you think we got here? Plenty of wannabe philosophers out there railing about the era, the country, and human nature. They don’t know shit.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: But if you’re walking down the road and a highwayman with a knife asks you for some charity...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Are you gonna have a heart-to-heart about Leithania’s corruption? Or about Rim Billiton’s blood-soaked operations?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Uh oh...! I can’t... hold out much longer...!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: He’s thinking about how to kill you and get away with it. And you’re thinking about whether you should shoot first, or try to put a little distance between you.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Nine times out of ten, you’re just trying to make it out alive.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: There’s always little people to sacrifice. Turns out they’re people like us, not like you.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: You rest easy, talk about your ideals, complain about the shitty state of the world. You talk about the big picture. The real enemy is far away, so you don’t deal with the problems right in front of you. Hah!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: It’s working! Keep it up!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: But you’re all innocent! It’s not like you all wanted this...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Innocent? Pfft. I don’t need your sympathy. None of us are innocent. Piss off.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: We’re doing what it takes to survive. Even if that means somebody else can’t. There’s no charity in survival.
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Hey! What’s up with that nine-tailed Vulpo girl?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Target her! Quick!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Gah! My staff... it snapped! Where did that bolt come from?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: We’re here.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Ayerscarpe and Click should be out there evacuating civilians. As for us...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Folinic?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...Reunion.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I know what I heard. They were cheering that Reunion liberated them.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But they’re not...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: They’re the core of this riot. Get rid of them and it falls apart!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If it weren’t for them, Atro would still be alive!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Folinic!
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Calm down.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: This isn’t your first time. It’s not mine... either.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I’m just... at a loss.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Let’s go. Rhodes Island is going to find a way to stop this riot.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: It’s Rhodes Island. You put all your hopes in a bunch of kids, huh?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: They’re so green. They didn’t even get here in time to stop all this. It’s already over.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...But they are warriors.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Warriors, who have known the battlefield.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Have the others withdraw.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We will go.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The Sarkaz tears off the Reunion symbol and raises a hand, causing crumbling rocks to once again gather together.
The battlefield falls silent. The rioters give way, and the protesters retreat in fear.
Only Mudrock steps forward, but one step.
